tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: **** ********* *** correct medication. Very supportive throughout. We approached the doctor for throatpain and temperature. He was very prompt in suggesting RTPCR and once it was determined that I had covid, he was very thorough in suggesting correct course  of action.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been going to Rahul sir for almost 5 years now and we find his diagnosis always to the point. He is straightforward calm very attentive  and definitive  in his treatment. He starts with a conservative pproach for minor ailments and reads all the reports patiently. When he refers you to someone he will inquire about you  with that person. We recommend him everyone who is looking for a thorough and detail and accurate diagnosis. Thank you Rahul sir!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have known Dr.Rahul for the past 2 years or so..our complete family consults him including our elders, relatives and friends. He is just a phone call away whenever we need his medical advice..our goto person..thank you for being so consideradate and approachable at any time. Whoever consults him are very happy with his treatment..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** *** ****** ********** ** ************ ********** ***** We had consulted him when my family was battling COVID. He was extremely systematic in his approach and had prescribed certain tests and medicines which helped us recover well. Can’t thank him enough for navigating my family out of the COVID crisis

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Rahul Chirag was very friendly and gave enough time to listen to our health issues. He patiently explained us the diagnosis and treatment that was given. He took the stock of the situations during the follow ups. He answered all our questions very nicely. I could definitely recommend him to my family and friends.  I am very satisfied with his consultation.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Rahul Chirag treated My Family and Me for Covid.
********* ** *** ********** **** ********* *** we have recovered.
Doctor also suggested general preventions and precautions which were very helpful.

I am very thankful for him being very supportive sometimes even outside his working hours.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi sir,
 
I am really happy with treatment and friendliness of doctor.I have never seen these kind behaviour of doctors especially in these covid situations.

I have recovered from the covid but I didn't convey any message to doctor but doctor called me and asked that what's your condition now it really means a lot for me and my family members.

Thanking you sir. God bless you and your family members with good health and wealth.

Thanking you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Chirag has been very supportive in giving me timely treatment and recommendations.I am extensively hypertensive and his timely advice has been helpful to tackle this problem in time.He understood the problem, the health history and current complications and advised accordingly in detail.I am relieved to have him as a family physician for immediate consultations.
Visited this doctor for my mother treatment. He is very polite and excellent in finding out the issue to the core and providing relevant solution.
